contact_prompt: For contact, comments, ideas and insights:
memory_game_desc: Find pairs of matching cards. Want to play?
snake_desc: The classic snake! Feed it and be careful not to crash.
tetris_desc: Arrange the falling blocks in rows. Ready?
balloon_pop_desc: Pop as many balloons as you can before they fly away!
drawing_board_desc: Draw freely on the board. Time is limited!
endless_runner_desc: Jump over obstacles and collect points. Good luck!
game_over_win_desc: You finished the game in {moves} moves.
redirecting_message: You will be redirected back to practice shortly...
my_coins_rules_1: For every 12 correct answers, you win one coin.
my_coins_rules_2: Collect 3 coins to get free access to a game!
use_coins_and_trophy_success_toast: You used 3 coins and won a trophy. Good luck!
solve_and_win_promo: Solve 12 correct exercises and enter the world of games!
enter_email_for_reset: Please enter your email for password reset
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account
signup_description: Create a new account to get started
switch_to_signup: Don't have an account? Sign up
